title: Gareth Davies proves his worth for Wales: 'I'm ready to shine in the World Cup'
text:
Gareth Davies, the Wales scrum-half, learned of a statistic this week that led to a brief moment of surprise. Of the 13 tries that Davies has scored for his country, six have come at a Rugby World Cup.

Six tries in only seven World Cup matches, in fact, the latest being his crucial interception score against Australia in Tokyo. Now he has his eye on scoring twice ton Wednesday against Fiji to improve his record in the game’s biggest tournament to one try per game.

“It’s alright isn’t it,” Davies said after being informed of his record. “I will have to try and get two this week. I like to think my form away from the World Cup is pretty good, but it is a good stage to shine on.

“A couple of hours...
description: Gareth Davies, the Wales scrum-half, learned of a statistic this week that led to a brief moment of surprise.
